developer_response: {'id': 19165658, 'body': "Hello! Thanks for the detailed feedback! This level is hard. Focus on creating combinations next to the stars. Don't use rockets - they are not effective against stars. You can also watch video tutorials on passing this level on YouTube.", 'modified': '2020-11-17T13:03:18Z'}
review_description: i loved the premise and story it s one of the most engaging match  story out there i want to know what happens next and it s kept me invested until now i like the decoration and i like that they occasionally come out with more to keep it fresh and new even if they sometimes need ad what i do nt like is how hard the level have gotten after level  or so it became impossible to win level on the first try i ve had level i ve literally been stuck on for day after level  not level  but one freaking hundred the game need a ton of key to progress the story and i m at the point where i ca nt win level on the regular level or on the specialty level at all it s really frustrating i have a ton of match  game on my phone and i m not a bad player but this game is so impossible that i m stuck on level  and have been for an actual week—and that includes using booster the game just doe nt give you enough move any longer or ha challenge that are physically impossible with the way they re set up i m using extra booster and even ad supported booster and i still ca nt win i m literally about to throw the towel in because i m tired of losing all the time unless the game difficulty is modified or there s an easier option added i might be done i play match  game to have fun decorate and relax not to be so stressed about impossible level whoever designed these level clearly never played them themselves without cheat or mod because for example level  ha more star ie block than you have move and many of those star are double encrusted and you have to free a key and there s a rotating piece that keep you from planning move i ve tried adding booster adding move and even using ingame booster and the level literally can not be won the new game update with new furniture also can not be won it s so frustrating and i hate losing this much i highly encourage the developer to rethink the difficulty no one want to play a game that constantly make them angry because level ca nt be won update thank you to the developer for the response it s clear that you do nt care how hard the game is or how frustrating and have no plan to change anything judging by your developer_response:
Hi Joel!
We are really sorry to hear that you've got all these feelings from our game. There are no paywall levels, not a single one that can't be passed. Yes, sometimes it might seem that RNG is not on your side but be sure that there were tens of levels where it was on yours, that's why it's called RNG.
Anyway, we believe that you'll make it! :)

There are always two sides of the coin.
